name: Dexterity
long_description:
Dex is the adaptive layer for intelligent data collection in an agentic world. Static forms can no longer keep up—they must evolve to empower agents to act on behalf of users, dynamically adapting to optimize processes and provide seamless, flexible touchpoints for personalized interactions.

Let’s reimagine forms as the foundation for AI-driven, user-first systems.
one_liner: Gather smarter feedback from day one.
